Title: Creates the "Dignity for Immigrants in New York State Act", prohibiting detention of individuals based only on the violation of federal immigration laws
Summary: Creates the "Dignity for Immigrants in New York State Act", prohibiting detention of individuals based only on the violation of federal immigration laws.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to creating the Dignity for Immigrants in New York State Act prohibiting state and local law enforcement agencies from detaining individuals based only on the violation of federal immigration laws
